website_summaries.verdict: The best budget space-saving vacuum with a variety of sizes for different items.
pros: Bag construction includes a double zip seal to keep the vacuum seal tighter than other options
No mold, mildew, or bacteria can enter the bags
Comes in medium, large, and jumbo sizes for different clothing
cons: The plastic exterior of the bag can rip open if the bag is not handled with care

customer_reviews.title: These bags far exceeded my expectations! I am moving ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags far exceeded my expectations! I am moving and filling my car with what was left after the box truck. Down comforter, down mattress pad, and large pillows. I am also planning to put a bag full of clothes. It worked so well I plan to store winter clothes with them since my new place is much smaller! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The pump that they give you with the product works just fine you guys
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure how I would have done my moving and packing of it wasn't for these space saver! They are a life saver rather. The pump that they give you with the product works just fine you guys, it might take a minute two or more but it does the job. These XL bags are huge enough to actually fit it a memory foam or something. I probably should have picked up a smaller size but I could fit it all my clothes into 2 bags. And all my jackets too! Really really good. And mine ding expand or anything later. It stayed the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Dunno why I didn't buy these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I was complaining about not being able to fit everything in my case for an upcoming trip and a friend suggested I get some spacesaver bags. I did, and now I am addicted! I just emptied a whole bunch of winter stuff out of my linen cupboard and now, safely vacuumed packed it is hiding under my bed. Then I took a bunch of t-shirts that I don't wear, but can't throw out (they have sentimental value) and did the same thing. I find myself looking round the house for MORE to pack away...it's addictive, so be warned! It is also very easy to use, and the bags are re-useable and yes, great as an aid to packing too!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I wanted to wait a few days to write a review to make sure the bags do not leak. The size is great, I was able to pack two 1 inch thick queen size blankets (do not compress as much as comforters) and two twin/full blankets in one Jumbo bag - which honestly was a surprise. The package went from 28 inches down to about 11. It's been 5 days and the bag is still as it was when i first packed it. I have yet to see how these do for repeat inflation-deflation cycles, but have no reason to believe they won't hold up. Overall great product, excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Kxg269

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Bags
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Very well priced. Very large too. In 1 large bag I can put 4 king size plush blankets, 3 plush dressing gowns and several other winter items. And I still have more room to spare if I wanted. I've tried several bags out of the package and nothing has leaked. Seem well made. Vacuum works great, and so does the hand pump (although takes a bit of time hand pumping air out of the huge bags). I like having the cap you have to screw on after taking air out, that way I know nothing will knock the seal while the bag is stored causing air to seep back in. Good to know the rubber seal is protected.
customer_reviews.author: microcameraguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by the amount one bag holds. Could not be happier with product or seller.
customer_reviews.author: WLS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm moving to another state and these bags are lifesavers! I have a ton of clothes and my entire wardrobe fit into one of these sets. Done. I'm sold. I will be using these from here in out!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Worked great so far but I only tested them. Look forward to seeing how they do on my trip but after playing with them they seem really well made and I should have no problems. Plus they come with a life time guaranty!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and can't believe I waited so long ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and can't believe I waited so long to buy this. Right now with the summer heat I have been trying to find the best solution for all my winter comforters/blankets/throws and these bags have been a miracle. We have a huge fuzzy winter comforter that is tucked away perfectly now and completely air tight sealed so I don't have to worry about anything happening to it. These bags have given so much free space in my home I would for sure recommend this product to anyone trying to save up some space :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was satisfied. The bags looks like they can be used ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying this, I had doubts because this is pricey for a vacuum bag. When I received the bags, I was satisfied. The bags looks like they can be used for multiple times. Good quality. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Khin Zar Win Pyae

customer_reviews.title: These bags are the perfect answer. I can store extra clothes
customer_reviews.text: I needed to save space in our travel trailer. These bags are the perfect answer. I can store extra clothes, linens, towels, blankets, etc, in these vacuum bags using just of fraction of the space otherwise required. So far love them. Easy to use, work great. I ordered a variety pack of six-two of each small, medium, large, used them and just ordered two more variety packs. May end up buying more for things I'm putting into storage. Great space savers, great product. Life time warranty. Can use over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Packard

customer_reviews.title: If you ever need to pack away winter coats and blankets, these are a must.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Wisconsin and the winters get pretty cold meaning we have tons of blankets, heavy coats and sweaters which is fine in the winter but for the rest of the year, they take up so much space. These bags have given us back so much space and keep all of your winter things clean and protected until you need them again. Just as a note, it does come with a hand pump which does, in theory, work but you'll be at it all day. If you have access to a vacuum, it's definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: They work great. We use them to store our winter comforters
customer_reviews.text: Received the bags in about a day. They work great. We use them to store our winter comforters, they slide nicely under our bed ready use.
customer_reviews.author: Leona H.

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it.. all works just like it should. 4 days later and still holding in form of pancake. sealed and tight
customer_reviews.author: cub4bearin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to watch all the air get sucked out! haha. I put my giant down comforter in there and it worked like a charm. The hand pump works as well, just takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum storage bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags arrived very quickly and we used several and they worked as advertised. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza D

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get them to stay inflated longer than 15 min (only one did) one came already ripped and another ripped immediately because they are very thin. I'm not sure the point of the little blue plastic thing but all of them fell off, had to hand squeeze each bag shut, disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!  Not the Greatest!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! I ordered these to pack my sons college bedding and other items for storage over the summer. First off, the Ziploc ones are way better. The small plastic pump that is included with these bags is ridiculous! By the time you try and pump one bag, you will need Tommy John Surgery! It's impossible. I sucked out all the air with my Dyson hand vac and I walked away and came back and it was full of air again. I wrestled with these bags for over an hour! Such a pain! Get the Ziploc that have the little plastic piece on the zipper to help seal the bag properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be holes or not sealed well -
customer_reviews.text: vacuum seal doesn't hold there must be small holes not visible to the eye or not sealed along edges well enough... Kind of like an air bed one little hole somewhere makes entire thing deflate. These deflate and I am doing everything properly theres so it was a complete waste of money. Dont even want to bother going through a return process and all that inconvenience these products should work such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Lucido

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love my SpaceSaver bags. Easy to use and quite strong! Leaving on the Big Island where mold is a big issue it’s nice to be able to pack and unpack my clothes and stuff that are not needed at all times!!! I save so much space. Space is not what we have a lot off. What I love the most is how much stuff you can put in one bag!! I even use it to travel. Makes my suitcase lighter and pack more!
customer_reviews.author: Nails Plus Salon

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the zip lock version
customer_reviews.text: While the xl size holds alot even king sized blankets the bags I bought did not stay vaccum sealed. I would suck the air, it would be completely flat and in a day or 2 all the air would be back. I thought I did something wrong so I tired again and again and the bag kept inflating. I needed room because I was due anyday so I tried one more time, got it flat and shoved it under my bed, it inflated under my bed and it was hell to get out. My aunt bought over a zip lock version and I've never had an issue with it. Sooo JUST BUY THE ZIP LOCK VERSION
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great, but ziplock still rules
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It does what you want it to, but in comparison to the ziplock brand, it doesn't seem to do as well as far as compressing the items you're storing goes. Don't get me wrong, it does what it says it will do in that it creates a vacuum seal that allows you to make more space from what you put in it. It's just that the material that is use for the bag itself does not seem to be as pliable as with what you get with ziplock. As far as the vendor is concerned, I am happy with their delivery. It was on time and packed well. No complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Will develop leaks after a few uses, but they completely stand by their warranty
customer_reviews.text: We bought two 6 packs of these bags and hoped to use them to store bedding between family visits. Unfortunately, all the bags started to leak after a few uses. Perhaps they are more delicate than we are capable of working with, but regardless, we were not able to use them more a few times. We contacted the seller after we started running into leaks and they absolutely swapped them without any fuss. Even paid for the shipping on the replacements, so there was no cost to us. The replacements had the same behavior, of course. To be fair to them though, I don't know if any of these consumer vacuum bags are really re-usable more than a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking it will be good to save some space. I was happy to se how much space I was saving with those bags, but unlucky this item does NOT work. (you can see my pictures after 3 days I have to vacuum the bags again, and again). So I tried to call the seller but for my surprise there's is not phone number, web page or email for them to be found, just a regular mail address, so I called amazon to help me out in here before I post a review, but confirmed with me there is no form to contact them. thanks to Amazon I got my money back. WOULDNT RECOMMEND THOSE BAGS.
customer_reviews.author: Christian C.

customer_reviews.title: I am sending the wrapper to the company for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am sending the wrapper to the company for a complete refund. We packed Sunday night so we could load the car on Monday. The bags broke their seal before we took them out to the living room. We did everything again and covered the blue tab with duct tape and we also covered the length of the seal with duct tape. Again by the time we got to the living room, a few feet away, they began to expand. I had used them under the bed for comforters and low and behold their they were all puffed up. Enough said don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Blomquist

customer_reviews.title: Bags reinflated after 24 hours of careful storage
customer_reviews.text: After 24 hours of being stored in my closet, the bags have all reinflated. I followed all the directions and also made sure not to overpack the bags. Very disappointed. The ONLY bag that has not reinflated is the one I still have standing upright (vertically) against the wall waiting to be stored flat on the shelf like the others. Going to try this product one more time and hope for better results.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy jumbo size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm moving myself in a U-Haul trailer so I'm trying to compact everything I can. I bought the small medium and large and jumbo space saver vacuum bags. I even bought the hanging garment once which also work great. All have worked great except the jumbo bags which I bought to put all my homemade quilts in. They will not hold their vacuum I tried all six of them that came in the bag. Don't know what the problem is at this moment I don't care cuz I'm moving tomorrow. But don't buy the jumbo size. I gave it all a five star because I am very pleased with the rest of the bags just not the jumbo ones
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: If you don't care about what happens once you've put it in storage, then go for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these SpaceSaver Premuim Resuable Vacuum Storage Bags to simplify a move. I won't be able to reuse most of them. Four of the six popped and won't be able to vacuum seal again. I loaded them into a roof bag (another bad product...yikes!) and when I went to take them out, they were all...not inflated, but the opposite of deflated where it's just a regular bag...and wet. Six jumbo sized bags of clothes, blanked, pillows, etc. had to be washed immediately because they were getting a mildew scent. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: So awesome! Life savers for saving space!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! I’m moving 2 hours away and absolutely hate dealing with boxes when moving, especially when it’s not a local move and only using my small car to haul my personal belongings. These are wonderful for putting in my car and making room for so many other things. I don’t have a vacuum so I had to use the included pump— which is pretty easy to use but definitely gave me a workout lol it works great so I didn’t mind! The bags fit quite a bit and were great quality. I put clothes, blankets, towels and bedding in various size bags I ordered. All great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I bought multiple ones of these.
customer_reviews.text: They are okay, and are a great space saver if you can get them to work properly and get ones that aren't defective. I bought a few, and found multiple bags did not hold the "Vacuum" very well. You need to make sure that the bags are "zip locked" properly, and even then there were several defective bags among the multiple boxes I bought. I bought about 15 bags worth, and got about 4 maybe 5 that did not hold the air properly. The large bags are great, we use them to store entire bed linen sets, including the comforters. If you can get a whole box of quality working bags, then that's great for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: I intended on using these bags to store some winter blankets, pullovers, jackets etc.. with the idea that i could save some space and wouldn't have to worry about insects, or any unwanted shenanigans damaging the stored items. 1 bag has remaind sealed. 1 slowly leaked over a 3 week period. 2 bags wouldn't stay sealed long enough for me to stow away the vacuum hose. And yes i read and followed the instructions carefully. Even had supervision to make sure it was the arrow, not the Indian.
customer_reviews.author: SapperSean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bags
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of these bags, and the lifetime guarantee is really nice. They arrived promptly, and was surprised to find a 10% discount on my next order. These seem to be very sturdy bags, and I like the variety of sizes. Filling the typical large ones with winter clothes just become too heavy to lift. I will certainly do business with this firm again.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieCub

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of set of 6 failed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy when I was able to store our patio cushions in 6 jumbo bags in a small storage space. Happiness did not last long. The next morning 2 bags re-inflated. Tried again with the same results. The manufacturer has a lifetime guarantee posted boldly on the bag itself - see picture. Quickly dashed off a request for replacement on the indicated website which did ask the details of my purchase and order number and got an automated response that it was received. That was a couple of weeks ago...still waiting. I'm supposing that I will never receive a response...so much for the 'lifetime guarantee'. ..and the reason for my one star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: A Seller that Honors Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2017; they worked great for about a year (re-vacuumed while spring cleaning); later I found four of six had re-inflated, and continued to do so despite refilling/resealing (one was fine, and one unused at that point). Contacting via the address on bag was fruitless, but when contacting via the Amazon site, WebDeals Direct were quick to replace the bags, and polite in the process. This was much appreciated, and I would happily purchase from this seller again. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. N. O'Nemus

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love love love these!
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/19...really bummed 3 of the 6 bags didn't keep air out while being stored. Thought maybe the zip lock top wasn't "tight" and tried it all again with no avail. Trying to connect the company to see if I can get 3 bags replaced. Original review... I freaking love love love these! I do not have the closet space for extra pillows and blankets etc. These are perfect. I put 2 queen comforters in one bag and probably could get more. I will definitely be buying other sizes for clothes next!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie D.

customer_reviews.title: If you need space, you need these.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to store our decorative couch pillows we weren’t using. 3 giant pillows fit in the XL size and all 9 pillows are now stacked in 3 of the bags under our bed. We also put all our winter clothes in one bag. This created SO much more space in our storage closet! It’s such quality material as well. Buy then, you won’t be disappointed! *I was not compensated in any way to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: KRC13

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN SPACEBAGS
customer_reviews.text: I love these. What makes them truly distinct and amazing is that they come with a pump that screws into the bags to suck out the air so you can actually use them for travel (unlike spacebags) because you don't need a vacuum. Also a great alternative for people who don't own a vacuum or who have sensory issues and cannot tolerate the noise vacuums make. I used to have to constantly pester my housemate to vacuum the air out of my space bags. I no longer have that problem because I have switched all of my bags over to these. Also, THEY LAST LONGER. I could not be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: One time use bags
customer_reviews.text: Probably 1/2 of these worked for ONE time. Purchased these to get more space for a road trip. About half of them out of all of them ended up working. So I was happy about the half that actually worked. They actually did what they were supposed to and saved us tons of room. I would Recommend getting a saver bags, but get ones that are more heavy duty. I paid a lot of money for something that only some worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get them to hold a seal. Good heavy plastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first experience with space saver bags of various brands. It's not uncommon for the bags to need to be re-vacuumed periodically. I can't get the seal on these bags to hold even overnight. In addition, the bag arrived slit open top to bottom with the hand pump missing. The bags are nice and thick, heavyweight plastic, which is why I gave the product 2 stars instead of 1. I assume there's a problem with the seal -- on all six of them. I've had a better experience with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the jumbo bags for two reasons. 1. I have a queen size, foam mattress pad that I use only for camping, but the thing is huge to store and travel with. It fit in the bag perfect and worked perfect! Now it will travel better by taking up less space, plus it came with the handy pump so we can shrink it back down to get it home. Win, win! 2. I have a beautiful denim quit that I use in the winter and this allows me to store it safely in the closet without taking up all my storage space. Thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Lashley

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, saves a TON of space!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for storage. I have lots of bedding that needs to be stored and not a lot of space, so these work great. Just wish that they sold an electric pump with these bags instead of a manual hand pump which takes some effort. You can still use a vacuum, however, that's not practical for travel. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. FYI, I bought this electric vacuum pump: Ambran Home and Travel Vacuum Bags with Electric Pump--which works really fast and is portable for travel (however, it comes with 4 bags that aren't as good as the Space Savers).
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have performed better. Everything was really easy to use, superbly manufactured, and well thought out. The pump works 100% - no worries, if you had any. 1- Open the bag like you would a ziploc 2- stuff it until the STOP line 3- attach this little clip-y thing and ziploc it closed 4-Screw the pump onto the opening and starting pump air out 5- when your arms almost give out, stop. 6- screw on the cap and DONE! I bought the large and that got me by just perfectly. I packed 5 or 6 really big thick winter coats in one bag. And almost a quarter of my summer clothes into another.
customer_reviews.author: SaikoAsh

customer_reviews.title: Inflates/no seller response
customer_reviews.text: I thought these bags would be great for our move especially with a lifetime guarantee replacement. We bought 22 bags and so far 4 have inflated. We followed directions and re did them and still they take in air. I emailed the company to get replacement but never heard anything back. I was really hoping this was going to work as well for us as it did for everyone else on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Spring4

customer_reviews.title: Only brand to buy
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased other brands to save a few cents - they work great the first time and that's about it, very few have lasted past that. Can't talk about longevity yet, but Spacesavers already has outperformed the cheaper brands, well worth the extra cost. Plus they are guaranteed - My bag of 6 from Amazon had one defective bag and Spacesavers sent me a free replacement after I emailed them. btw, check out their website before you purchase, they run periodic sales (like on the 4th of July) and I found them cheaper than Amazon, including free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Double J

customer_reviews.title: These bags do not hold suction, the bags re inflate withn hours
customer_reviews.text: The bags are big but they do not hold suction the bags re-inflated the same night , the suction does not last.i followed all instructions properly I re did it twice and the suction still did not hold .. I am not happy with this purchase so now the search continues to find some good space bags to put my comforters in, which is the only reason I purchased these bags for in the 1st place.
customer_reviews.author: a.b

customer_reviews.title: using to protect 3d fdm printer material
customer_reviews.text: Have had mixed success thus far. Moisture is an enemy for our 3d printer material. I thought using dessicant bags within these vac bags would be an inexpensive solution. Maybe the shape or the heat from the cartridges caused this, but 3 of the bags developed holes that allowed ambient air to infill. Company was great nad replaced with a whole new box. I changed the timing and direction of how I put the cartridges in the bags...maybe that helped improve? Unsure at this point. I will add these do fit the stratasys fortus/dimension cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all
customer_reviews.text: I bought the space saver bags in large because I wanted to store old memorable t-shirts in the attic, but didn't want them to get ruined over time. In one large bag alone I fit about 15 shirts (women's small) and 3 jackets. It also comes with a pump making it even easier (so glad I didn't have to take out the vacuum). It literally sucks all the air out and now I can safely store it in the attic!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: takes a little care, but works fine
customer_reviews.text: Our first attempt at putting something in the bag and sucking the air out with our vacuum cleaner gave us an outcome that looked like a 3-D relief map of the Rocky Mountains. The product took up more space than the object that we were trying to compress and store. Next we put a piece of plywood over the bag and laid on it before we sucked the air out. That way we ended up with a very compact product as we had hoped. Honestly, we haven't read the directions yet, so maybe this gets covered for those patient enough to pay attention to instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Great to help consolidate linens for our move!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We're using them to consolidate linens for our cross country move. NOTE: Be sure to use the "zipper" mechanism that's not attached but included in the package. I didn't realize they were included until half way through my packing and already had a blister from closing both closures lines with my fingers! :-/ Speaking of BOTH closures, be sure they're both sealed completely or you will lose suction pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drenth

customer_reviews.title: Indeed saves space but you have to work a bit to get there
customer_reviews.text: Like: The space savings are absolutely real. Happy I bought them. Dislike: 1. Bags are NOT cheap. Actually IMO they are over-priced. But then I had no issue with stuff re-inflating as I have read in the reviews of other products. So I guess you pay for the quality. 2. You need a bit of planning to arrange stuff inside the bag before vaccuming out the air to make optimal use of the bag-space and to make sure it can be folded easily. If done incorrectly, you have one stiff board to deal with. I had to make sure post-vaccuming I can still fold it. Took a couple of iterations to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: Too big so difficult to store
customer_reviews.text: These are too big for what I need. They become so hard when deflated that I’m finding it difficult to find a storage place because they’re so large. I think I will buy smaller ones. I bought the largest size because I have a collection of Amish-made quilts that are bulky to store & I thought I’d need the large bags. I can store at least two Queen-sized quilts in each one but I think I’d rather just store them separately in smaller bags. I found the hand tool included with the bags to be helpless, but perhaps it would not be if using smaller bags.
customer_reviews.author: Zann

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning up clutter
customer_reviews.text: We had a ton of extra blankets, pillows, sheets, etc filling up our closet shelf and I got these to try to consolidate everything. I was able to clear all of the extra stuff using only 2 bags and got them so flat that they fit perfectly into another closet up high and out of the way. I will adjust this review if I see any sign of leakage or tearing / re-inflation like others have mentioned in their reviews, but so far I'm happy with this purchase and was able to clear up more space for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: So far So good, love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received them on Sunday and I was already to fill them up. I cleaned my closet out and started loading them up. I used my own vacuum cleaner to get the air out which was much faster but I'm sure the hand pump works as well just not fast enough for me. The xLarge was a perfect size for what I was doing but I intend to purchase a few smaller ones as well. I also purchased the ones that hand in the closet and they work great as well. Like I said, so far so good. I also see on the packaging that it is a lifetime warranty which I think is great.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Wingate

customer_reviews.title: First bag, already filling back up  :-(
customer_reviews.text: Thought it is a HUGE bag, bigger than I have seen. I removed all the air and it slowly over the last 6 hours has begun to fill back up with air, so it will not stay condensed. I am not exactly seeing the point of these bags, unless it is to fit it into a container that you can strap securely shut and container is strong enough to not let the contents burst out when it fills back with air. Sad, disappointed on my first attempt to use a bag. I will try one more bag and see if this one is the problem before I return them.
customer_reviews.author: VTS

customer_reviews.title: Roll your clothes before putting them in the bag and press on the bags as you vacuum seal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small bags and was able to store all of my sweaters. I have between three to five sweaters in each bag depending on the type of sweater (bulky/lightweight). I found that they work better if I roll the sweater up rather than fold them. I also found that I could get them much more flat (not lumpy) if I pressed on the bag while vacuum sealing the bag with the included pump. I am very pleased with these bags. I had owned another brand that I bought at a local big box stores that didn't work as well as these. I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: pshughs

customer_reviews.title: First bag got a whole easily, second bag won't stay sealed
customer_reviews.text: First 2 bags i used, we put in clothes and a couple non-sharp items, somehow the first bag got a 2 inch tear in it and i patched it with duct tape and vacuumed it and it worked ok. The second bag has no visible whole but will not stay vacuum sealed. It's frustrating that the product doesn't do the thing it's intended to do. I suspect that sealing it on a tile floor and moving it around may have created micro abrasions that don't allow the bag to stay sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good but issue with 2 out of 10 filling with air.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try to combat a moth issue. 2 out of the 10 I purchased re-inflated. I gave the 2 with issues a second chance by sealing & sucking the air out again and they both filled back up. I'm sure I'm using them correctly as I had success with the other 8. I don't want to spend more money and have 1 or 2 potentially not work again. They say lifetime guarantee on the packaging - does anyone know how to get replacements?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I are moving so I bought these to condense our obscene amount of clothes for ease of transport. The jumbo bags hold quite a lot but I wish I bought more just for the convenience. Using the hand pump is a real P.I.T.A. but it’s manageable. I just stuffed the bags as much as I could, sat on top of it, sealed the bag, and pumped away until all the air was out. I can’t speak to how long these will stay compressed without re-inflating since I just got them and we plan to empty them tomorrow. But it saves space in the car which will save us an extra day of a U-Haul rental.
customer_reviews.author: Guy-who-buys-things

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, but overall an awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I expected, but that’s fine. I knew what size I ordered to begin with, but I didn’t really measure it out to see how much room this size would take up in the trunk of my car. They work great. Not quite sure if I’ll ever use the hand vacuum it comes with (it would take forever), but using a vacuum cleaner works fast and it’s easy. These are, overall, a great product! They hold out air for multiple weeks so far. I purchased these for a move from Florida to Utah for grad school, and to make sure they worked, I tested two out. They’re still vacuum sealed and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why so many people have had problems with these leaking? I used all 6 bags to store backstock of beach towels that I sell. I wasn't sure how well they would work since the towels are not nearly as fluffy and air-filled as saw, a pillow or puffy sweater or something like that. They all worked great. They have been sealed for a little of 2 months now and none of them have leaked at all. They were also really easy to use. The hand pump provided worked great. Super easy, very happy with the purchase. They also have a lifetime warranty, which I think is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Alaman

customer_reviews.title: Not good.  These bags are not good at all.
customer_reviews.text: I carefully loaded two Jumbo bags last night with pillows in one and linens in another. Before I spent time doing the other 4 bags, I decided I would test them by leaving them overnight to see if the vacuum deflation stayed put overnight. Nope. I've attached a picture of the two bags, one stayed nicely and the other didn't last 12 hours. It also tells me these would not be good for travel as advertised and are probably one-time use at most. I am wholly disappointed in this product and will be contacting Amazon to return.
customer_reviews.author: geMac

customer_reviews.title: Great value for storage staples
customer_reviews.text: Love using these to store bedding, seasonal clothes, and sentimental/seasonal decor, throw pillows, blankets, quilts, etc. They work just as they should. And great deal on amazon if you can get them with a discount - I got the 6 jumbo bags for $19.99.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used brand name space bags for years, and now my loyalty has shifted. Fast delivery, excellent product, easy to use and seals great. Recently moved from large house to smaller home and the packing and moving were facilitated by the bags, and will definitely be used for seasonal storage. I can't believe how pleased I am with the product! Highly recommend these bags. Have not used the hand pump but will definitely try next time I travel. Have ordered extra large twice, will try the smaller sized for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish these had TRULY worked as stated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and received these the same day. I read reviews and "several reviews noted" they did not hold the air out or they leaked air right away. MINE "LEAKED" AIR IMMEDIATELY upon trying to cap them from the sealing slide bar area. So very disappointed. I bought the "original space bags" from 25 years ago. THEY DID NOT LEAK and held up excellently. Please redo these new ones! Now I'm stuck w/ a product that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to close the top properly
customer_reviews.text: I could not get the top ziplocs to close all the way, no matter how hard I tried. This was true for all the bags in my order, so I don't think it was fluke. The lack of a good closing mechanism makes these bags useless for their intended purpose. For people who just want a plastic sack that doesn't close, they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Maybe infomercials are onto something
customer_reviews.text: I’d always see these on late night tv and think “who would use those?” and now that I have more bedding than I know what to do with, the answer is “me, I NEED to use those...” and they work great! It’s so satisfying watching a bag of pillows get reduced to a flat sheet. Only gripe I have is with the zipper. It takes a couple passes up and down to make sure the whole thing is connected, and even then I’m not totally confident. But, I have yet to experience any leaky bags. 5*
customer_reviews.author: ScottyD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These bags could swallow an elephant! I have a parka that is heavy, bulky and took up a huge part of our closet area. I have never used a space saver bag before and I did not know what to expect. I shoved the parka in the bag... sucked out the air... and Tada! The bag is probably no higher than an inch. It now slips neatly between a little bit of space on top of the closet. Order today, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: Good for one time using
customer_reviews.text: Used once when I moved from NY to TX two years ago, the bags worked good. I just took the bags out today because I need to pack again and move back to NY now. The bags were re-inflate after I vacuumed air. I tried twice and Still the same thing. I went to the website and tried to get the lifetime replacement guarantee. It asked me to fill the activation code. And the code is printed on the lifetime warranty flyer inside the box of the product. I’d like to ask, how many of you guys will keep a flyer from the merchandise? Lifetime replacement guarantee is a joke :)
customer_reviews.author: Susie C

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo sized storage help!
customer_reviews.text: Jumbo sized bags take a trash bag size amount of blankets, pillows, and clothes and reduces its size into something flat you can store in a closet or under a bed. Keep in mind, it’s still has trash bag sized dimensions so for the jumbo sized bags you’ll need a jumbo sized suitcase if you’re going to be traveling. Would recommend a much smaller size for travel. Hand pump works well, vacuuming is a bit more efficient—faster and gets more air out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brumm

customer_reviews.title: Better Versions from Other Brands, Hand Pump Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: These items are great but there are much products from other brands. These bags burst open in my move (only a van ride a couple blocks away) and thus haven’t worked for long term storage. Other brands fit much more. They are also nearly impossible to deflate with the hand pump. In fact I had to buy a different vacuum to use these. If you are planning on using the hand pump try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Filled 5 with various pillows and blankets. 1 ripped trying to put away. Could have been my fault, not the reason for 2 stars. But did puncture easily. 3 of the other 4 leaked air out. 1 is still holding, 1 I haven't used yet.
customer_reviews.author: gracsampet

customer_reviews.title: These bags were a disappointment would not stay shrunk.
customer_reviews.text: Too bad there was not a 1/2 star, These bags were a disappointment would not stay shrunk. I have used this brand before with great success.Tried 3 times. Maybe it was because it was the JUMBO size I really do not know. I am sending this size back and ordered the large size. Will let all know how they work.
customer_reviews.author: beauti4ash

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR RV STORAGE NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as we needed some solution for our winterized RV. They are an amazing product. The only thing is that it is better to be used with a vacuum as the hand pump that comes with it; takes a while to suck all of the air out. (if using the hand pump; squeeze as much air out of the bag as you possibly can. Other than that the product does exactly what it says. It fits 4 queen sized pillows with the pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: B. Swangin Webster

customer_reviews.title: It’s the little things that hurt this product
customer_reviews.text: The size of these bags were decent, but if you do not have a working vacuum with a hose, there really is no other way to get the air out. Also, the zipper-like plastic clips that come with each bag, are not connected to the bags. That was a little tedious to deal with being they didn’t want to stay on. The reason I give this three stars is due to the bags not staying air tight.. I filled five bags and two of the five slowly filled back with air. Also, don’t lose the little caps that screw over the part that you suck the air from because they have to go back on to complete the airtight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: 2/6 didn't hold vacuum
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these bags but that love only lasted until the next morning when I noticed one of the bags was deflated. I tried unzipping/re-zipping and vacuuming but again it was deflated by the next day. I filled out the "request a replacement" form on the spacesaver.us site but 2 weeks later I still hadn't heard anything back from them. I filled it out again referencing the same Amazon order ID but another week passed without a reply. Meanwhile I just noticed another one of the bags has gone floppy. Grrr.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vacuum Storage
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Don't go for the cheaper options when buying vacuum storage bags, as you will find they lose their seal much faster, or even worse, rip when vacuumed even remotely tightly. These worked very well for my move from the US to Canada. Threw some in the back of a u-haul, threw others in storage unit. The u-haul ones still had a tight seal after a 20 hour bumpy drive, and the storage unit ones lasted the whole year I was in Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my apartment that we moved into does not have any linen closets. I had to buy a separate storage unit for my excess blankets and I have some big blankets. So I put my blankets in one of the bags and sucked it out it is so great save us a lot of space. Only thing is I don’t know the vacuum because our apartment doesn’t have carpet so I do use the hand pump which took a little bit of time. But I was still able to get it very compact. I fit two queen size blankets in one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charisma

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store clothes I’m not currently using (smaller sizes and office clothing). I stored some clothes a few months ago and needed to get one of the sweaters last weekend. When I opened the bag the clothes smelled just as good as when I put them away fresh from the dryer all those months ago. One of the bags opened up a little when I stored them so I recommend you take care when stacking them so it doesn’t happen to you. This is a great storage solution for when you don’t want to Mari Kondo your clothes or linens but don’t want them in the drawers taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are great and save a lot of space. I also like how the fabrics will remain safe and fresh while being stored away. I am about to order the extra large for some big pillows! I have a Dyson handheld vacuum and that didn’t work for sucking the air out and used the hand pump. It was fine, just took a bit more time.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip73

customer_reviews.title: Decent bags to use for a move
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. I wouldn't recommend them for long term storage. I am using them to pack up clothing for a move, so they should work out fine. A couple of the bags in the pack were found to have small holes and will not hold a seal. I've tried a lot of different brands of these bags and prefer the Ziploc brand when krrping things in storage. The Ziploc brand are made of a much heavier plastic, hold a good seal and I can reuse them.
customer_reviews.author: Yissa

customer_reviews.title: When they say ‘jumbo’ bags they really mean it!!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality but watch your sizing. I ordered very large ones for comforters and they were HUGH. I tried 2 of them, one sealed perfectly, the other leaked some. Mine came with a pump which was REALLY nice even if it did take some time to pull the air out. Customer service was great and when/if I’m in need of this product again I would not hesitate. I’d just be wizen at the sizing!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: great space saver
customer_reviews.text: The bags are really big, perfect for storing stuffed animals! I had 8 garbage bags of stuffed animals and reduced them down to four bags that are sealed so no mold, dust or fungus rots them. The foam seal is holding the air really well, much better than other designs. The hand pump worked well. I am not sure if a vacuum sweeper would have been better but the hand one worked just fine. Glad I got the six pack. There is a guarantee to replace any bags that don't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it 5stars, but customer service is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: *update- they replaced these bags quickly, so I updated my review. The small bags are perfect for packing for travel! I love these bags. I love them so much I immediately ordered more to give to my parents to use on an upcoming trip. Unfortunately 2 of the bags leak. I followed the instructions on the bag and went to the website to submit for a replacement. I have not heard anything from the company so unfortunately I can’t in good faith leave them a very positive review. I hope to update soon with a rating increase in/when I hear about my replacement bag.
customer_reviews.author: EMill

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these kind of bags before and was not too impressed. These are just the opposite. Nice thick plastic, great seal and very good pump. And very large. I had my old vacuum with a hose on it packed back behind a bunch of stuff, so I used the pump. I was surprised at how well it worked. I have COPD and the pump didn't wear me out. I did 4 stuffed bags. If your looking for a quality product this is it. Plus I read that if they ever fail they will send a replacement right away. Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use easy to stuff easy to seal shame they don’t stay compressed
customer_reviews.text: So these are easy to stuff they’re easy to seal, the problem is they don’t stay compressed. Four out of six deflated in one day yes I sealed them correctly because the other two stayed sealed one I resealed and sucked the air out again and by the next day it was back to being deflated I did buy some medium ones also one out of three of the medium ones deflated so I guess it’s hit or miss with these. I bought two packs of the jumbo so the one is going back. They are jumbo and no complaints on size.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: when they work they're great & thats the issue!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two 6-pack jumbo spacesaver bags. Out of the 12 bags 5 are not working - 2 have pinholes which I can hear air leaking but cannot locate exactly where the hole is to cover it. The other 3 bags - no rhyme or reason - have closed them up to 10 times, ensured cap is on and still they reinflate. The 7 that are working gave me no trouble closing, putting cap on and remaining deflated (3 days later). Sent email to Spacesaver.us yesterday and have not heard back from them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lady di

customer_reviews.title: Better than the the competitor brand
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased some of these vacuum storage bags from a competitor brand in a local store. I liked them but needed more and found the SpaceSaver brand on Amazon for cheaper so I thought I'd try them out. The SpaceSaver bags were way thicker material and much more durable. They seem to hold air better and no leakage. My set even came with a hand pump in case it's needed! I am VERY happy with these bags and will buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap imitation
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these do not hold up to the more expensive brands and for $10 more or so you're better off spending that money. Tear easily while moving around, seal for hose isn't great so it takes a long time to fill, holds less than same sized bags, deflates for no reason, zipper seal tool isn't effective def can't use more than once (ie seasonal clothes) as they tear too easily.
customer_reviews.author: JackS

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would use again!
customer_reviews.text: I have these and the jumbo size space saver bags and they’re awesome! The product works great! We recently traveled with them. We used the vacuum on the bags when we left for the airport and then used the hand pump coming home from Vacation. It worked great? Very easy. I would buy again! In first package of these one of the medium size bags didn’t close all the way, the only one I had a problem with out of the 12 bags I own. I contacted the company and they got right back to me and sent me a replacement. They’re a great company I would do business with again! Plus, the lifetime warranty is great!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Delossantos

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!! SCAM CHEAP QUALITY.. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: The item was broken after only a month. This item is CHEAP quality and is NOT WORTH it. The brand said life time guarantee however they did NOT respond to any of the messages, they ignored all my messages. This is a SCAM. There is no guarantee to replace the item.
customer_reviews.author: AzCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Work great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and worked way better than expected - 4 pillows in an xl bag, essentially flat. Great for storing in the attic without having to worry about dust mite, mold, etc. The hand pump might be good if you’re desperate but seems like you would be pumping all day (same with any brand) - highly recommend using with a vacuum hose - only took seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Can not use for traveling unless you put 1 or two items only. Best for storage . It is bulky but you can put the package on shelves and off the floor. Great. I can now walk into my closet/. Thank you Lord.
customer_reviews.author: Dangereous shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT
customer_reviews.text: Well I like the bags because they keep clothing and linens clean but so far out of the 6 bags I bought 5 are inflating again. I will vacuum seal them again and see what happens. I’ve tried other brands also and it seems they have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what you would want, bags are durable and instructions are straightforward. The included hand pump is a nice touch if you want a good excuse to work your forearms when taking the air out, you can also use a vacuum of course. I would say if you have storage limitations or just want to get more room in your closet, this would be a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: spicygamethunder

customer_reviews.title: As advertised but need a strong vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The little hand air pump is laughable. You really need a vacuum cleaner with a hose attachment for a bag this large unless you looking for a good workout :). Overall, quite remarkable how much space we saved storing our king-size beddings.
customer_reviews.author: TheBadDog

customer_reviews.title: Wowzers
customer_reviews.text: We just downsized into a much smaller house so I lost all my storage space and closets. This pile was dubbed Mt. blanket and has since been reduced to these bags that will slide under the bed now:) Very happy with these so I ordered some more for our extra clothes! Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime guarantee is a lie
customer_reviews.text: Update = nearly two years after buying and now getting spammed to delete my review for $20. No thanks. All the bags leaked within 1 year and no way to access the guarantee. Have not had any problems with the other brand I bought > 1 year. I want to like the product but have 2 leaking, less than 9 months. Followed the directions to return and guess what you can't, the web site is a dud, there's no way to return ... some lifetime guarantee. They cost a bit more than the other brands but I bought them because of the guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: MAURA

customer_reviews.title: Great concept made with poor quality Material.
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely trash. It keeps the air out the first day you use it but the next day the air starts seeping in due to the cracks on the bag that occur on the spots where the bag contours to the cloth inside. I would not recommend this item at all. No doubt, great concept but very cheap plastic used to make the bags. You are better off using a trash bad for storing your clothes and vacuuming the air out, it would definitely last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Zeeshan Abbasi

customer_reviews.title: Choose right, have the job done
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of vacuum bags from different brands, but, till now, they weren't really good. This time I've read a lot of feedbacks before taking a decision. And the facts show that the decision was right. The bags don't let air in, look strong, and the added vacuum pump is an excellent addition. I'm so happy with the purchase that I already think about buying some more of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Petru Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Great space savers
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! Saved space when packing the car. The jumbos are too big for a suitcase but you can slide them on top of things in the car using little space. The vacuum cleaner hose doesn't pull a complete vacuum because it doesn't match the size of the opening, so we finished with the hand pump. It's been a few days and the vacuum seal is holding. I'll see how the clothes look after we unpack. They hold a lot....only needed to use two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Spacesaver Premium Vacuum Storage Bags. 80% More Storage! Hand-Pump for Travel! Double-Zip Seal and Triple Seal Turbo-Valve for Max Space Saving! (Jumbo 6 Pack)
feature_bullets: 6 x JUMBO SIZE BAGS - can fit 4 pillows or 1 queen size bedding set per bag! Store away your duvet, bed sheets, towels, blankets, and more! 80% more space than other bags on the market!

SQUEEZES EVERY BIT OF AIR OUT OF THE BAG! The unique Double-Zip Seal and the Triple-Seal Turbo Valve are designed to get every ounce of air OUT of the bag in the suction process – and nothing gets back in! Other storage bags let air back in, and defeat the purpose. Not these!

INCREASE YOUR STORAGE SPACE without having to clean out your closet! Our Spacesaver bags are an ideal solution for adding more storage space to your wardrobes, closets, garages, basements, lofts, and suitcases.

FREE TRAVEL PUMP INCLUDED! When you’re travelling and want the MOST space so you don’t have to take a lot of luggage, these storage bags are PERFECT! And when you have to re-pack for the return trip, just use our FREE convenient Travel Pump, and your bags will be air-tight vacuum-packed again!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars21,963 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
